short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows time since the last stream from Nanashi Mumei

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
How to use:
1. Pin the addon to your toolbar
2. Click on the icon on the toolbar
After a second or two a window should pop up just like in the screenshot showing time passed since last time Nanashi Mumei did a live stream on YouTube.

If you encounter any problems feel free to contact me by email
